name: Small World Social
overview:
Small World Social creates cloud-based technologies for businesses to connect with their audiences.

The company has developed a patented technology platform that guides users through products, new technologies and administrative systems in multiple languages and geographies. The unique technology uses an interactive video narrator to guide participants through third-party content. The system is often used to overlay onto legacy systems, helping them to appear up-to-date without affecting or modifying existing corporate infrastructure.

The company has developed an extensive international patent portfolio and is considered to be a leader of new and innovative technologies in the technical on-boarding and systems field. The firm focuses on providing B2B and SaaS services to global companies and governments.

Small World Social assists learning by putting the person back into the online equation by:

Improving product knowledge -

Using an interactive product training course can improve product knowledge in a fun and motivating way. Our video narrator will guide your staff, customers or industry experts through your products and their features. The product benefits and features are highlighted using fun interactive content.

Understanding and using technology platforms -

Give your customers and employees a digital training centre where they can interact with new products on a deeper level.

They get user-friendly guidance and you get the assurance that your target audience receives the service and support they need.

Navigating administrative systems -

Use an interactive guide to help improve and enhance your existing communication systems. Users will be able to fill out a digital form or registration document with a final validation that they have correctly completed the process.

Multi-lingual functionality means that you can break down language barriers and communicate with audiences all over the world.

With offices in Berlin (Germany) and Melbourne (Australia), the company is rapidly expanding with a client base in the USA, Europe and Asia Pacific.

Small World Social was founded by Kathy Phelan and Kanella Gougousis in 2009 and is privately held. An initial investment round was undertaken in early 2011 and was fully subscribed by a group of private investors.

products.name: Small World technology platform for connecting businesses to their audiences
